summary: Legislators, government officials, and the public want to know whether government programs are achieving their goals and what their costs are. To make these kinds of evaluations of the latest ship, IT system, or other acquisition, reliable cost forecasts and updates are required. We developed this guide, initially published in 2009, to provide agencies across the government with a way to produce reliable, high quality...
title: Cost Estimating and Assessment Guide: Best Practices for Developing and Managing Program Costs
